Fundera | https://www.fundera.com/ | New York, NY | Full-stack Rails developer

Fundera is an online marketplace for small business loans. We simplify the process of shopping for multiple small business loan products and offers (think Kayak), and let you both submit multiple applications and compare your offers all in one place.

We're looking for a full-stack Ruby on Rails developer to join our team in downtown TriBeCa. We offer a competitive salary and benefits. We're looking for someone that is as passionate about technology as they are about product.

Skills Required: The Rails Web stack -- Ruby, JavaScript, HTML (we use Slim), CSS (we use SASS), SQL, and basic Unix sysadmin.

For more info and to apply, check out our jobs page: https://jobs.lever.co/fundera . Thanks!
